data.text:
# Welcome to the Refreshed Twitcast Viewer App

Experience the best of live streaming with the new Twitcast Viewer app. Join our community of 30 million users on the lively platform of Twitcast!

# More than just Watching

While enjoying your favorite streamers, engage in real time with comments and gifts. Invite your friends from X (formerly Twitter) to amplify the fun!

# Stay Updated

Love a live stream? Add it to your notification list and never miss out when it goes live. Connect with X to add users to your list too!

# Be Part of the Stream

Join live streams with âCollaboâ feature and chat, and set up unique avatars for more interactive fun!

# Wide Variety

Pick from 100+ categories of live streams tailored to match your mood.

# Convenient Viewing

Enjoy lag-free streams on any network, with easy options for background playback and for viewing on a larger screen.

Join Twitcast - 'A place where everyone's favorites gather'. Discover more, love even more!

---

# Unlock More with Membership

Join our membership to enjoy special perks from streamers.

# Perks at Your Disposal

Membership perks span across a spectrum, depending on the chosen tiers. Here's a sampler:

- Digital certificate

- Membership badges

- Exclusive streams

- Exclusive offers from creators per tier specifics

Membership auto-renews monthly, and the prices depend on the tier you choose. More details are available on the enrollment page.

# Charges

Your Apple ID account will be charged for the membership.

# Auto-renewal and Cancellation

Your auto-renewal plans and their cancellation can be managed here:

Settings > Apple ID Account Info > Subscriptions > Choose the auto-renewal plan to enable or cancel.

Options to confirm or cancel the auto-renewal plan are also available on the AppStore App.

Please note that cancellations for the current enrollment month are not accepted.

# Terms of Service

https://twitcasting.tv/indexlicense.php

# Privacy Policy

https://twitcasting.tv/indexprivacy.php

----

LANGUAGES:English, Japanese, and others

* Note: This is the viewer application for "Twitcast Live (TwitCasting Live)".
